content.html: If you don't write Javadoc cause "it ages", better not update to #JDK18 because that excuse goes out the window. Now you can just write... /** * Here's how it works: * { example-code } */ ... while having your build compile and test `example-code`. youtube.com/watch?v=m2cVOY…
content.value:
If you don't write Javadoc cause "it ages", better not update to #JDK18 because that excuse goes out the window.

Now you can just write...

/**
 * Here's how it works:
 * { example-code }
 */

... while having your build compile and test `example-code`.

youtube.com/watch?v=m2cVOY…
